missionProperties.missionInfo:
{-} Rebel mission tokens represent inner strength. During each Status Phase, Diala discards 1 Rebel mission token. Then, she tests {J}. If she fails, she discards 1 additional Rebel mission token.
{-} The door is locked to all figures except Diala.
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the Holocron Chamber opens
{-} The Rebels lose when Diala withdraws or has discarded all Rebel mission tokens. When Diala has discarded all Rebel mission tokens, click the Entrance and select "Retreat".
missionProperties.startingObjective: Open the Door to the Holocron Chamber.

events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

A heavy mist settles about the forest as you travel in silence. A pained  expression crosses Diala's features, more than just the sorrow of returning here.

There is a darkness here, all of you can feel it. As you draw near to the place where Diala's master died, ghostly figures, your foes of past and present, rise out of the mist and attack.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Place 8 Rebel mission tokens in Diala's play area. Rebel mission tokens represent inner strength. During each Status Phase, Diala discards 1 Rebel mission token. Then, she tests {J}. If she fails, she discards 1 additional Rebel mission token.
{-} The door is locked to all figures except Diala.
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the Holocron Chamber opens
{-} The Rebels lose when Diala withdraws or has discarded all Rebel mission tokens. When Diala has discarded all Rebel mission tokens, click the Entrance and select "Retreat".

Diala pauses, kneeling before the ghostly vision of her master's killer. She whispers, "Please, master, forgive me."

At her words, the spirit vanishes and the mist sinks into the ground. The sense of darkness fades, and all that remains is an object upon the nearby pedestal.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Diala receives the "Shu Yen's Lightsaber" Reward card.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

You all awaken sorne number of hours later upon the forest floor. You don't even recall falling unconscious.

The mist is gone, but an eerie sense of darkness remains. Though no one seems harmed, you cannot shake the sense that sorne opportunity was lost here.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

A shiver runs down Diala's spine as the Dark Side of the Force tries to creep into her mind.

Diala discards 1 Rebel mission token. Then, she tests {J}. If she fails, she discards 1 additional Rebel mission token.

eventActions.mainText: Dark voices whisper in Diala's mind. They speak of power beyond her imagination.

events.eventText:
Diala give's in to the temptation. Strength and fury flood her mind as she raises her weapon against her enemies.

Diala discards 1 Rebel mission token and moves up to 2 spaces. Then, she performs 2 attacks.

Diala takes a deep breath and shakes her head, denying the whispers. She is filled with determination, but the ghostly silhouettes of your enemies surge forward. 

Diala claims 1 Rebel mission token, and each other hero within 3 spaces of her recovers 2 {H}  and 2 {C}.

Then, the Imperial figure with the highest cost that can attack becomes focussed and attacks {rebel}.

eventActions.tbText:
In the darkness stands the ghostly figure of Shu Yen, Diala's master. "Diala, please!" he cries. "You must come backf"

Screaming in agony, the spirit's form changes, flowing outward and taking the shape of a familiar, terrible foe. Upon seeing this, Diala releases a cry of sorrow and leaps forward to attack.

{-} When <color="red">Darth Vader's Shadow</color> has suffered *2* {H}, he is defeated.
{-} The Rebels win when <color="red">Darth Vader's Shadow</color> is defeated.

eventActions.repositionText: Block line of sight to <color="red">Darth Vader's Shadow</color>.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Rebel mission tokens represent inner strength. During each Status Phase, Diala discards 1 Rebel mission token. Then, she tests {J}. If she fails, she discards 1 additional Rebel mission token.
{-} The door is locked to all figures except Diala.
{-} When <color="red">Darth Vader's Shadow</color> has suffered *2* {H}, he is defeated.
{-} The Rebels win when <color="red">Darth Vader's Shadow</color> is defeated.
{-} The Rebels lose when Diala withdraws or has discarded all Rebel mission tokens. When Diala has discarded all Rebel mission tokens, click the Entrance and select "Retreat".

events.eventText:
As her companion cries out with pain, a shiver runs down Diala Passil's spine. Seeing her friend suffer saps some of her strength.

{-} Diala discards 1 Rebel mission token for each activation token the wounded hero possesses.

mapEntities.mainText:
The ancient, crumbling door leads into the Holocron Chamber.

Only Diala Passil can open this door.

Deploy the heroes here. 

If Diala discards the last Rebel mission token, click "Retreat" to end the mission.
